We will hear from @Grambling1901 President @RickGallot on why HBCUs deserve a seat at the table and how Grambling is already getting ahead of the innovation and cybersecurity training curve.

Our economic and national security depend on a thriving and diverse cybersecurity workforce. We need diverse voices to solve our most complex cybersecurity challenges. An integral part of creating a robust cybersecurity talent pipeline is recruiting from our HBCUs.

Cybersecurity is an in demand, high paying field with an estimate of 3.5 million job openings by 2021. However, the field lacks diverse talent. I‚Äôll be discussing why diversity in cybersecurity matters today at my @HomelandDems subcommittee hearing this afternoon.
